caption.center: JAMES DuRALL, JR., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. HOME-OWNERS INSURANCE

opinion.opinion_text:
Order
SC: 143037, COA: 293910, Genesee CC: 08-088948-CK
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the March 29, 2011 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
MARILYN KELLY and HATHAWAY, JJ., would grant leave to appeal.Page 1
